HealthQuotesHero.com Privacy Policy

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||2.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]We appreciate your trust and take care ensuring your personally identifiable information is kept safe. HealthQuotesHero.com (‘We’, ‘ Us’, ‘Service’) and its websites (‘Services’) will only use said information for purposes disclosed in this privacy policy.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label="Information We Collect and Use" _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||1.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

Information We Collect and Use

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||0.9rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]We collect personal information when you use Our Service, including name, telephone number, email address, date of birth, and zip code. Information you enter is used to identify health insurance products and services that fit your profile. Additionally, this Service collects personal data from its Users for the following purposes and using the following services:[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.4.4" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||2.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" hover_enabled="0" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" text_orientation="left" max_width="25rem" module_alignment="center"]
  • Access to third party services
  • Remarketing and Behavioral Targeting
  • Analytics
  • Heat Mapping services are used to display the areas of a page where Users most frequently move the mouse or click
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label="Emails" _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||1.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

Emails

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.4.4" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" link_text_color="#2a618f" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||2.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

When submitting your email to us, you are registering to receive communications from us directly and from our 3rd party service partners. If you no longer wish to receive these communications, please let us know by clicking on the unsubscribe link in our emails or by directly visiting our unsubscribe link on HealthQuotesHero.com.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label="Third Parties" _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||1.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

Third Parties

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||2.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]When you click from our site to another, please keep in mind you will be interacting with a third party and not governed under our terms of service or privacy policy.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label="Cookies" _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||1.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

Cookies

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||2.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]We use cookies to improve the quality of our service and we track usage statistics to better understand how people interact with our site. Cookies do not collect personally identifiable information and we do not link the information we store in cookies to any personally identifiable information. You can refuse cookies by turning them off in your browser. We also will place a pixel provided by a third party partner on your computer to track the number of end-user conversions we obtain from our advertising.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label="Disclaimer, No Warranty, Limited Liability" _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||1.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

Children’s Privacy

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" link_text_color="#2a618f" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||2.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]This Website is not intended for use by children under the age of 18. We will not knowingly collect any personal information from visitors under the age of 18. With any questions regarding this matter, please contact us at info@HealthQuotesHero.com[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label="Changes to Our Privacy Policy" _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||1.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

Changes to Our Privacy Policy

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||2.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]If we change our privacy policy, we will post changes on this page. Please check this page from time to time to ensure you are aware of changes – our privacy policy will indicate the date of update. Your continued use of our site indicates your agreement to the changes unless you notify us otherwise.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label="Links To Third Party Sites" _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||1.3rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

Contact Information

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" link_text_color="#2a618f" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||1rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]Electronic To cancel or correct your personal information: send an email with your User Name and the notice “My Information” in the subject line to info@HealthQuotesHero.com. To express or ask questions regarding privacy concerns: send an email to info@HealthQuotesHero.com.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.2.2" text_font="Open Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#000000" text_font_size="16px" text_line_height="1.5em" link_text_color="#2a618f" header_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_text_color="#222222" header_font_size="26px" header_line_height="1.04em" header_2_font="Montserrat|600|||||||" header_2_text_color="#222222" header_2_font_size="25px" header_2_line_height="1.08em" custom_margin="||1rem||false|false" custom_padding="0px||||false|false" header_font_size_tablet="" header_font_size_phone="23px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_2_font_size_tablet="" header_2_font_size_phone="22px" header_2_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]Mailing Address HealthQuoteHero 405 Waltham Street, Suite 408 Lexington MA 02421 Updated: February 14, 2020[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
